amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the Coast Guard from assessing or collecting any fee or charge for the inspection of ferry vessels.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the Coast Guard from assessing or collecting any fee or charge for the inspection of ferry vessels. The amendment would permit the Secretary of Transportation to reduce expenditures by a comparable amount to compensate for reduction in revenues caused by such prohibition.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roth amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
